name: PneumococcalVaccineSCT
title: Pneumococcal Vaccine SCT
description: SCT codes for allergy to Pneumococcal vaccine (conjugate and polysaccharide) and also to any component of the vaccine.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SCT codes for allergy to Pneumococcal vaccine (conjugate and polysaccharide) and also to any component of the vaccine.),(Data Element Scope: CONDITION:),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes for allergy to Pneumococcal vaccine (conjugate and polysaccharide) and also to any component of the vaccine. Also includes codes for the medicinal product.),(Exclusion Criteria: All other codes for allergy to any other vaccine including any procedure codes of administration of the vaccine.)
